@JorgeO Jealous!
@AlyssaRosenberg They didn't fire him because his work was unproven; they fired him because he proved it!
@AlyssaRosenberg But they want trials that will help Osborn, which means not lizards and a sample size >1.
@AlyssaRosenberg Also, did you think Stacy's claim about the car thief was true? I thought he was just bluffing to make Parker look bad.
@AlyssaRosenberg And he experiments on himself because he's fired and it's his last chance to save his limb; not to help Osborn.
@AlyssaRosenberg Connors studies reptiles because he lost his arm (and they can regrow limbs), not the other way around.
@TheByliner "Read at source" link broken; it's now: http://t.co/MWC9zSy3
You can now watch @matthewstoller's show on Hulu! http://t.co/t7I5Qdwa "People are laughing in your face, Matt!"
@PaladinVT03 Yes, as I said twice before I misspoke and said "has" instead of "exercises".
@JNaureckas Yeah, I'm saying you're even more right than you gave yourself credit for.
@PaladinVT03 Thankfully we're still not the majority.
@ModeledBehavior I later clarified I meant "exercises" instead of "has".
@binarybits And the fact is people get less freedoms they want from their employer than their government, right?
@JNaureckas Didn't say that either. Said it was a valid exercise of the Constitution's taxing power.
@binarybits That seems like an intermediate variable. Isn't the impact on real people what we care about?
@binarybits @rortybomb And the median employer uses their power much more extensively. The result is people submit to their employer more.
@binarybits Yeah, I meant to say "exercises way more power" rather than "has". IOW, people suffer employer tyranny far more than state.
@binarybits Yeah, for the median American, the government has very little power and their employer has an enormous amount.
@ATabarrok Do you believe a homosexual fired for being gay implicitly consented? I do not.
@binarybits So it's not a difference of principle?
@ATabarrok Don't you voluntarily contract to give it such a right if you decide to move there?
